item.description:
Hi all. Thought I would post this in case anyone was interested in attending. Got a flyer at the pet store today for Paws in the Park, a dog walk being held at Borderland State Park on October 10 at 11:00am. Proceeds benefit the Animal Protection Center of Southeastern Mass. Know that someone mentioned this park before here so passing on this info.

www.apcsm.org

Any one who would like to connect with other members meet in front of the information/bathroom building at 10:45am. there is no leader for this event, just facilitating connecting with one another. I will not be there so disregard me as a leader (don't wait for me)....Jacqueline
item.how_to_find_us: meet in front of the info/bathroom building at the parking lot

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Paws in the Park 10/10/10
